title: SMC_ReadAdditionalIpoState (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_ReadAdditionalIpoState
Returns additional state of the CNC interpolator, such as the current
decoder coordinate system (DCS) or the active path processing functions.

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment: The function block executes as long asEnableisTRUE.

rows.Name: Error
rows.Comment:
Signals, that an error has occurred within the function
block

rows:
Indicates whether the output State is valid.
As long as there is no error, Valid is TRUE if Enable is TRUE and
the interpolator has been started.
